title: Drawing, "Five Caryatids", 1800–25
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on blue laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Figures, one beside other. First and fourth figures, seen with upper part of bodies from back, legs in profile; Second and fifth figures raise both arms, while third and fourth raise only their left arm.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Five Caryatids", 1800–25.
1800–25. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on blue laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2256.
